name: Advanced Data Science
description:
Participants will complete a 6 part online training course covering:
- An introduction to data science
- Explanation of the scientific method, hypotheses, experiment design, analysis, reporting.
- Data collection
- Data distributions, introduction to the basic statistics useful for data science
- Data visualisation methods
- Hypothesis testing.
- Ethics of data science.

There is no evidence to be submitted for the completion of these modules, once the materials have been reviewed the students self declare completion.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete the whole online course and the associated exercises to be awarded the digital badge.
